author: vhennebert
msg: Bugfix: NPE when there is a forced break before a table occurring at an IPD change

author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1057: Code clean ups: Use replaceClass() method instead of removeClass() + addClass()

author: jleroux
msg: Closes OFBIZ-716, done by hand from an Andrew Sykes's old idea (found by chance)
"Allow pos memory setting to be set independently" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-716)

author: woonsan
msg: - Use Node.one() method to select a node by multiple css class names for efficiency and readability.
Remove findChildByClass() method because it can be written by Node.one() with multiple css class names easily.
- Use replaceClass() method instead of removeClass() + addClass()
- Comment out unused method, calculateResizeMargin(), because it doesn't seem to be completed.
- Don't use Node.setAttribute("css", class) because it doesn't allow multiple css names. Instead we can use hasClass(), replaceClass(), addClass() or removeClass() method.
